entry.title: Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,196Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 32

Summary: If anybody were to ask Kara why she chose to be a firefighter she’d tell you that she loves helping humanity and wants to give back to a community who gave so much to her when they so graciously took her in. If Kal El of Krypton asked Kara the same question she’d would’ve already thrown him into the sun, since it was his dumb idea to get her out into the ‘real world’.While there’s truth to the fact she wants to help, there’s nothing humanity has ever given her that she thinks she should pay them back for. Maybe she would help the Themyscirans for their training, however, she was already sufficient back on Krypton having been part of the army for years. But no, the reason Kara choose to be a firefighter was because it was a high energy job on a planet where she annoyingly couldn’t get drunk off her ass and thus needed something to keep her occupied.TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: Where The Lavender Grows Wild
entry.summary:
Author: rose_quartz_queen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,318Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 56

Summary: "From his vantage point on the museum steps, Buck can see Eddie for a little longer than Eddie can see him, and he watches as Eddie scans the crowd. Buck’s heart flutters in his chest, feeling like it's going to explode. He can still go home, he thinks, he can still leave. If he turns around right now, Buck can go home before Eddie even knows he was there. He can pack up his locker at work and leave, just like he did in Pennsylvania and South America. "After a not-quite-unexpected kiss, Buck and Eddie finally begin their journey as more than friends. However, as the pair get to know each other in a new way, Buck must finally come to terms with and heal from the past he has worked so hard to bury.A slow-burn fic exploring what it means to fall in love and find happiness after trauma.

entry.title: Where My Heart Belongs
entry.summary:
Author: Noel803

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,218Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 1,242

Summary: Something broke inside Buck in that grocery store. Eddie’s final words kept repeating inside his head. He was right; he was always right. All Buck ever did was hurt the people around him. It was why he had never stayed in one place for long before. Because inevitably, something was wrong inside of him, a piece that meant he would never belong. After meeting Eddie, he’d fooled himself into thinking maybe things could be different...maybe Buck could have a place in LA, with Eddie… but like always he was wrong. So, standing alone in the parking lot, Buck decided to do the one thing he did best: run.Eddie had never been good at controlling the wolf inside of him. It was always angry, unsettled, at least until Buck came into his life. The last few weeks though, without Buck, he’d lost control more than once. When Buck came to apologize, he really hadn’t meant to snap at him and it didn’t take long to regret what he said. Only by the time he went looking for Buck he was too late. Buck was gone. Eddie had to find him, and tell him how sorry he was, how he needed Buck sometimes much it hurt. He just hoped Buck didn’t get into anymore trouble.Or my Buddie werewolf AU that no one needs, but I’m doing anyway.

entry.title: you are not a punching bag, my dear
entry.summary:
Author: strictlybecca

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,109Chapters: 2/8Kudos: 14

Summary: “We’ll be long distance for however long you’re gone,” Buck says reassuringly, crowding closer until Eddie’s arms are full of warm, sweet-smelling boyfriend. “You’re not getting rid of me just by going to Texas. You’d have to try a lot harder than that.” Buck’s lips are against his a moment later and Eddie sinks into the lush kiss eagerly, wanting to soak up every last bit of Buck before he folds himself down and ships himself off to El Paso to be a dutiful son.aka the one where Ramon gets sick and Eddie has to go home to help.

entry.title: Buck, Bothered, and Bisexual
entry.summary:
Author: 1dalso

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,662Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 28

Summary: It’s as if time slows down, or the world comes to an abrupt halt.Not only is this guy probably the same age as Buck, but fuck. This might just be the hottest guy he’s ever seen— and he likes girls."Phew! That’s one fine man,” whistles Hen from the kitchen, sidling up besides Chimney, “And I like girls.”Buck eagerly nods in agreement, because who’s he kidding, he likes girls too. But hey, attraction is each to their own, and he finds whatever this is, quite attractive.He can unpack that later. Preferably at home. Maybe with a beer. Or two.—Buck and Eddie meet for the first time on the cusp of Buck's bisexual awakening. How much of the newbie, Eddie Diaz, can Buck handle before he takes matters into his own hands... and maybe gives those matters a kiss on the mouth?

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 161,726Chapters: 26/26Kudos: 870

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until, by a twist of fate, they bring him face to face with Buck himself.This AU is canon divergent. Some things change but some stay the same.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 263,675Chapters: 27/40Kudos: 767

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until he can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready. --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Title from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: A Noble Sacrifice
entry.summary:
Author: Chromedove

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,768Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Eddie practically raised his sisters, always putting their needs above his own, even at great personal cost. Now, years later, and recovering from being shot, he’s still struggling to put himself first. When Sophia arrives for a surprise Christmas visit, she brings with her long-forgotten memories and reminders of the sacrifices Eddie has made—hoping to help her brother finally realize that he, too, deserves happiness.Apparently, this comes with realizing that maybe him and Buck have deeper connections than they originally thought...

entry.title: Eddie’s Lovesickness (Literally, not Metaphorically)
entry.summary:
Author: Fennit

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,789Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 7

Summary: Today might just be a good day. A great day, even. This bagel and coffee are sparking a fuck ton of joy right now. Buck sparks…huh, I don’t know…it’s very close to joy, but it's not…Weird. My stomach kinda hurts now. Oh, well. My coffee and bagel are good enough for me right now. Hopefully that’ll help. Now, this shift better be alright. No tomfoolery. No hijinx. No nothing. Just chill. Relaxed. Calls that aren’t crazy. It's indeed a Monday. First day of the week. What's the worst that could happen? +Eddie feels his emotions, and his body doesn't know how to deal with that.Have you ever tried to ask out a crush and get "butterflies" in your stomach to the point where you feel sick?yeah, that's this fic. But from personal Experience!

entry.title: Eddie's trials and tribulations in 97 acts
entry.summary:
Author: dandyboy_skz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,872Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 2

Summary: As Buck watches Eddie return to his dishes, he realizes that he looks ashamed. Why would Father Brian showing up make Eddie ashamed? And then it dawns on him. Eddie wouldn’t dry heave and panic over just a wet dream. It must have been more. He must have dreamed about something. And oh. He dreamed about Father Brian. The Brian who is a priest and…a man. Oh my god. Eddie had a gay dream about a priest. His catholic guilt is definitely having a field day right now.Buck doesn’t even care if Eddie is going to pull away. He feels that as Eddie’s bi best friend, he is uniquely equipped to handle this situation. And he has to help him somehow. Or...Eddie develops a little crush on Father Brian after meeting him at the juice bar which leads lots of catholic guilt and working through some major compulsory heterosexuality. All so he can be emotionally ready and available for Buck when he eventually realizes that he's definitely in love with his buff best friend, roommate, and co-parent. Oh, and Eddie still leaves Buck but only for a couple days and comes back with Chris, so it's perfect.

entry.title: Season 8, Episode 15 My unscripted version Named 9-1-1 — “CONTAINMENT LINE”
entry.summary:
Author: Villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,422Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 5

Summary: COLD OPENINT. PACIFIC GENOMICS – BIOHAZARD LAB – NIGHTRed strobes. A SIREN keens. SPRINKLERS spit uselessly over sealed glass.BOBBY (hoarse, commanding)Everyone, masks! Stay clear of that bench!SHATTERED VIAL hissing, blue vapor boiling across a stainless table.HENNegative pressure’s holding— for now.CHIMNEY (checking pulse ox)My O2’s fine. Ravi?RAVI (trying to steady his breath)Green across the board. No breach alerts on our suits.A steel door SLAMS shut. A red banner on the wall blinks: CONTAINMENT ENGAGED.BOBBYWe are not infected. We are contained. Remember that.He squeezes the push-to-talk.BOBBY (into radio)118 Captain to Command, we’re sealed in Containment B. Possible exposure, no symptoms. Fire’s spreading in the corridor.
